projects.title: Sanofi A-Lab – Patient Like Me
projects.bodyText:
- Engineered a super-graph connecting EHR data and the Precision Medicine Knowledge Graph 
- Predicted poentential patient cohorts to TNF-alpha inhibitors, improving trial targeting efficacy by 30%
- Awarded 1st place in the MIT Analytics Lab Cup

links.href: https://github.com/NaiqiZ/ALAB_Sanofi_PatientLikeMe/tree/main/Presentation/Sanofi A-Lab Patient Like Me Final Presentation.pdf

projects.title: Early Prognosis of MAFLD Progression Using Deep Learning
projects.bodyText:
- Developed deep learning models (Binary Classification, Time-to-Event, and DeepSurv) to predict MAFLD progression from structured EHR data
- Applied SHAP analysis and regression to identify predictive biomarkers

projects.title: Accelerating Emergency Response - Ambulance Dispatch Optimization
projects.bodyText:
- Built optimization models (Min-Sum, Min-Max, Robust) to reduce ambulance response times across Manhattan
- Performed sensitivity analysis to recommend station staffing and identified underserved areas

projects.title: Campbell GenAI Chatbot for Marketing Analytics
projects.bodyText:
- Built a multi-agent GenAI chatbot using LangGraph and MLflow for Campbell’s marketing team
- Enabled structured data querying, LLM-based reasoning, and automated marketing insights

projects.title: ML-Powered Health News Recommendation from Twitter
projects.bodyText:
- Built a personalized recommendation system for public health content using tweet data
- Combined natural language processing, clustering, and engagement scoring to rank relevant tweets by user interests

projects.title: Evolutionary Analysis of Alternative Open Reading Frames Across Mammalian Species
projects.bodyText:
- Constructed bioinformatics pipelines to analyze 86 internal ORFs (int-ORFs) across 12 mammalian genomes
- Modified the OLGenie method to assess evolutionary constraints and identify selection pressures on overlapping coding regions

projects.title: R Package for Hurricane Tracking and Analysis
projects.bodyText:
- Developed an R package using HURDAT Atlantic storm data to track hurricane paths and interpolate storm trajectories
- Crafted a vignette to demonstrate storm track visualization and climate trend analysis from 2020 to 2022
